caption:
Turns out... Mom was always right! 💖 
Who else grew up hearing those iconic beauty tips from their mom? From “less is more” to “a little lipstick goes a long way,” these mom-isms still ring true today. 💄✨

 This Mother's Day, let's celebrate the OG beauty gurus. 👩‍👧‍👦 Swipe through for a walk down memory lane. 💬💕 

(Mother's Day, Mom, Makeup)

#MothersDay #BeautyWisdom #ThanksMom #Lakme #LakmeIndia #MakeupTips #MomKnowsBest #MotherDaughterMoments
